member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates that no reason was specified for the action taken by the receiving .

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.MessageExpired
member.summary: Indicates that the message expired before it could be processed by the receiving .

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.PreviouslySeen
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving had already seen the message.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.UnintendedRecipient
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving was not an intended recipient.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.IntendedRecipient
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving was an intended recipient.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.DuplicateTaskId
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving generated a task ID for a task that was already running.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionReasonType.MaxConcurrentTaskCountReached
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving has already reached its maximum number of concurrent tasks.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionType.None
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving was completely unable to recognize, forward, or otherwise process the message in any capacity.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionType.Accepted
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving accepted responsibility for processing the message.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionType.Ignored
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving disregarded the message for a valid and expected reason.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.HyperNodeActionType.Rejected
member.summary: Indicates that the receiving rejected the message because the message would have caused the service to enter an invalid state.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.HyperNodeCommandType.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates that the command is of unknown origin.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.HyperNodeCommandType.SystemCommand
member.summary: Indicates that the command is a built-in system command.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.SystemCommands.HyperNodeCommandType.CustomCommand
member.summary: Indicates that the command is a user-defined command.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessOptionFlags.None
member.summary: Specifies that the recipient node should process this message synchronously without returning a task trace or caching activity events

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessOptionFlags.ReturnTaskTrace
member.summary: Specifies that the recipient node should return an activity event trace for this message.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessOptionFlags.RunConcurrently
member.summary: Specifies that the recipient node should run the request in a child thread.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessOptionFlags.CacheTaskProgress
member.summary: Specifies that the recipient node should cache task progress for this message.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.None
member.summary: Indicates that the message was not processed

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.Success
member.summary: Indicates that the message was processed successfully.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.Failure
member.summary: Indicates that the message could not be processed.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.InvalidCommand
member.summary: Indicates that the message contained an invalid command name.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.HadNonFatalErrors
member.summary: Indicates that some non-fatal errors occurred while processing the message.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.HadWarnings
member.summary: Indicates that some warnings occurred while processing the message.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.Cancelled
member.summary: Indicates that the service was cancelled before it completed.

member.name: F:Hyper.NodeServices.Contracts.MessageProcessStatusFlags.InvalidCommandRequest
member.summary: Indicates that the ICommandRequest implementation was invalid.
